trans-unit.resname: CMB1·62 | Red Herring | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {1}{U}: Exchange CARDNAME from your hand with a permanent you control on the battlefield or a spell you control on the stack. If that permanent or spell was the target of a spell or ability, change that target to CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 敏捷\nCARDNAME每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击。\n{2}，牺牲CARDNAME：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMB1·97 | Pick Your Poison | Card Name
CMB1·97 | Pick Your Poison | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose any number of modes that total exactly 4. You may choose the same mode more than once.

trans-unit.resname: CMB1·97 | Pick Your Poison | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [1] Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

trans-unit.resname: CMB1·97 | Pick Your Poison | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [2] Create a 1/1 black Snake creature token with deathtouch.

trans-unit.resname: CMB1·97 | Pick Your Poison | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: [4] All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: •每位对手各牺牲一个具飞行异能的生物。
